alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 04 at 2:06AM MDT until November 05 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 PM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range and Natrona County Lower Elevations. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 9 PM MDT Saturday. The most widespread, very strong winds will occur between 10 AM and 4 PM Saturday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Elevated to extreme blowover risk for lightweight and high-profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...In a parking lot, park into the wind to minimize the possibility of your car door hitting another parked vehicle.
info.instruction: Use caution if you drive, and keep both hands on the steering wheel in case of a sudden strong wind gust.

area.areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations
